original_text:
Who among all these does not know
    that the hand of the Lord has done this?
korean_text: 이것들 중에 어느 것이 여호와의 손이 이를 행하신 줄을 알지 못하랴

sentences.original_text: Who among all these does not know
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 것 중에 누가 알지 못하는가

sentences.original_text: that the hand of the Lord has done this?
